pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, September 9, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the 2018 Canadian Firefighters Annual Memorial Ceremony.

Canadian Firefighters Memorial
200 Lett Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:45 a.m.
